no-restricted-syntax.message: ❌ Direct 'new Date()' usage is prohibited. Use date utilities from '@/lib/utils/date-utils' instead. See docs/architecture/date-handling-best-practices.md
❌ Direct 'Date()' calls are prohibited. Use date utilities from '@/lib/utils/date-utils' instead.
❌ 'Date.now()' usage should be replaced with date utilities. Use getCurrentUTCDate() or getCurrentDate() from '@/lib/utils/date-utils'.
❌ 'Date.parse()' is prohibited due to timezone inconsistencies. Use parseAndConvertToUTC() from '@/lib/utils/date-utils'.
⚠️  Consider using toUTCDateString() from '@/lib/utils/date-utils' for consistent date string formatting.
⚠️  Consider using formatDateForDisplay() from '@/lib/utils/date-utils' for consistent user-facing date formatting.
⚠️  Direct timestamp usage may cause timezone issues. Consider using date utilities for date comparisons.
